actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.

official_title: A bill to amend the Woodrow Wilson Memorial Act of 1968 with respect to the Hubert H. Humphrey Fellowship in Political and Social Thought at the Woodrow Wilson International Center for Scholars.

summary.text: Amends the Woodrow Wilson Memorial Act of 1968 to remove the fiscal year 1979 limitation on authorizations for the Hubert H. Humphrey Fellowship Trust Fund for the Humphrey Fellowship established in the Woodrow Wilson International Center for Scholars at the Smithsonian Institute.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Woodrow Wilson Memorial Act of 1968 with respect to the Hubert H. Humphrey Fellowship in Political and Social Thought at the Woodrow Wilson International Center for Scholars.
